item.title: All the adults colouring is leading to huge sales for pencil companies
item.description:
All the adults colouring is leading to huge sales for pencil companies

SYDNEY, Australia - So many adults are spending their days colouring in the lines, pencil companies are struggling to cope with the demand for coloured pencils and felt tip pens. Staedtler , the German company which produces felt tip pens and coloured pencils, has seen significant growth in Australia as adults get obsessed with the mindful trend.

item.title: Why You Need to Love Yourself More
item.description:
Why You Need to Love Yourself More

I used to believe that love meant putting everyone else and their needs first, before my own. While I do think there is some truth to that, in the sense that being a giving person is one of the ultimate acts of being a loving person, I came to realize that I must give to and love myself first and foremost.

item.title: Brooklyn's Luft Coffee
item.description:
Brooklyn's Luft Coffee

About five years ago, Blair Smith's twice-a-day coffee pitstop at NYC's Kaffe 1668 led to him striking up a friendship with barista Justin Rodriguez behind the counter. Smith then met mobile developer Aaron Sutula in a coffee seminar held by an espresso machine company. "I took a day off of work to go," remembers Sutula.
